    • createFeedingSchedule

      public void createFeedingSchedule(FeedingScheduleDto feedingScheduleDTO) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Create a new feeding schedule while validating it doesn't violate constraints.
      Parameters:
      feedingScheduleDTO - contains data to create a new feeding schedule
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if constraints are violated

    • updateFeedingSchedule

      public void updateFeedingSchedule(Long horseId, FeedingScheduleDto feedingScheduleDTO) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Updates the feeding schedule for the specified horse.
      Parameters:
      horseId - The ID of the horse whose schedule is to be updated.
      feedingScheduleDTO - DTO containing the new feeding schedule details.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If no feeding schedule is found for the given horse ID.

    • getFeedingScheduleByHorseId

      public FeedingSchedule getFeedingScheduleByHorseId(Long horseId)
      Retrieves the feeding schedule with schedule ranges for the specified horse.
      Parameters:
      horseId - The ID of the horse.
      Returns:
      The feeding schedule for the specified horse.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If no feeding schedule is found for the given horse ID.

    • findFeedingScheduleByHorseIdWithScheduleRanges

      Finds and returns the feeding schedule with schedule ranges for the specified horse.
      Parameters:
      horseId - The ID of the horse.
      Returns:
      An optional feeding schedule for the specified horse.

    • findEligibleHorses

      public List<HorseDto> findEligibleHorses(LocalTime time)
      Retrieves a list of horses eligible for feeding at the specified time.
      Parameters:
      time - The time to check for horse feeding eligibility.
      Returns:
      A list of DTO representations of eligible horses.
